attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the Third Kindom of Ur pikemen have consistantly been one of the most effective units with any armed force. Given the problems faced in Afganistan and Iraq blue sky thinking is required, instead of throwing money at highly problematic weapon systems and equipment bring back pikemen! 

A drilled phalanx would be more than a maych for any insurgant force and would bring back tradition and honour to the army.

rejection.details: Your suggestion should be directed to the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
